entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
